https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wpnkGp95wYoac3dRJXXKwpMoiod.jpg Domo creator Tsuneo Goda's shortfilm combines Sade's song "By Your Side" with the stop-motion story of abandoned plush-animals after the 2011 Great East Japanese Earthquake and Tsunami. By Your Side
